description:
SZC Wallet will be a full-featured wallet, which will help physical enterprises, project parties and other merchants to create a closed loop of full wallet operation through the combination of product functions such as currency trading system, broker system, shopping mall, game, OTC, Yuebao, and wealth management.
The SZC digital wallet module will provide functions such as digital asset storage, transfer, financial management, quantization, interest deposit, loan, payment, and flash exchange. This wallet not only has a digital financial module, but also has a consumer sector and an entertainment sector. Users can also conveniently use digital assets to make international payments and transfers at a low cost. In the future, the wallet will add multiple languages ​​such as English and Korean, and strive to push SZC to the world and become the world's leading open digital wallet in the field of digital assets.
name: SZC Wallet
